name: San Saru
description: San-Saru is a video game  cataloged with the genre of strategy, specifically tower defense. The theme of the game refers to the gods and mythology in East Asia. In this video game, the player must fight using two characters with the goal of defending Toshogu Temple from enemies. For it must place the attack towers (with the option to improve or sell) in places already predisposed in the level, finding the perfect location 7 and the best possible mix of troops. In turn you must attack the enemies with the abilities of the heroes (base attack or attack attack). selectable charge) until the battle ends.
